patchNotes.title: Talent and hero rework
patchNotes.developerCommentary: I believe Morales is either the top or at least among the top three most boring characters to play right now, according to a significant portion of the community. After considering these opinions, I agree with the players: Morales feels more like a tool for the team rather than a hero. You lack agency, and your role is reduced to a walking bot that simply presses Q on someone. The changes I propose are inspired by what I consider the ideal <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> character, the TF2 Medic. I aim to give Morales a similar level of agency and introduce some risks.

texts.text: Morales no longer has energy regeneration and starts with 0.

general.developerCommentary: This change is due to modifications in her ultimate ability.

texts.text: No more energy cost.
Healing reduced by 30%.

general.developerCommentary: The removal of the energy cost necessitated a nerf.

texts.text: Removed.

general.developerCommentary: <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> is a skill that predisposes Morales to being a healbot, as it provides additional survivability to another character without the need for precise timing like a cleanse or Medivh's Force of Will. It can be used indiscriminately. I believe it's unhealthy for Morales to have a kit that encourages passive gameplay, which is why I am removing this skill.

texts.text: Moved from level 10.
Will now be a basic ability on the (W) slot instead of being an ultimate.
Morales now doesn't start on the <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1>.
The <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1> will fly to the target location with the first hero that enters.
Reduces the <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1> duration on land to 3 seconds.
Heroes are prevented from entering the <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1> while taking damage.

general.developerCommentary: The <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1> is one of the few tools that gives Morales agency. It allows for rapid transport of players between map areas. By converting this ultimate-level skill into a basic ability, some adjustments are necessary for balance and practicality.

texts.text: You start with your ultimate now >> baseline << , similar to the tracer bomb
Costs 100 energy.

Activate to grant the current <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> target a 50% increase in attack speed and a 10% movement speed bonus for 6 seconds. Redirecting the <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0> allows the previous target to retain the charge for 0.5 seconds.
Gains 2 energy for every 125 health healed. Morales loses all energy upon death.

general.developerCommentary: As previously mentioned, I want to bring Morales closer to the gameplay experience of the Medic in TF2. Introducing Steroids as a baseline skill that charges up enhances Morales' engagement in gameplay, focusing on skillful play rather than passive cooldown management. This also distinguishes her from other healers.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  1, 0>

texts.text: Energy grant per basic attack reduced from 4 to 1.

changes.developerCommentary: Balancing the talent for the new ultimate

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  1, 1>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Morales now receives all movement speed bonuses from the target she's healing.

changes.developerCommentary: There's no more need for the energy BUT there's always a need for giving Morales a chance to heal junkrat with the fast mount and also follow the steroids target

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  1, 2>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Morales now reduces the <modified, abilities, basic, 2> cooldown by 3 seconds when hitting 2 targets.
Quest: Hit 3 targets with <modified, abilities, basic, 2> | Reward: Reduces Clear cooldown to 6 seconds.
Quest: Hit 4 targets with <modified, abilities, basic, 2> | Reward: Reduces Clear cooldown to 9 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: I rebalanced the quest so we could preserve the <modified, abilities, basic, 2> quest and bring earlier the <modified, abilities, basic, 2> reset

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  4, 0>

texts.text: No more energy cost.
Cooldown increased to 30 seconds.
Prevents Morales from losing energy upon death.

changes.developerCommentary: Rebalanced it for the new energy settings

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  13, 0>, <vanilla, talents,  13, 1>, and <vanilla, talents,  13, 2>

texts.text: Moved from level 13.

changes.developerCommentary: The <modified, abilities, basic, 2> talent tier was not very strong, and the new talents created for <modified, abilities, basic, 1> are somewhat stronger, so I'm shifting them to level 7 for better power spikes.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  7, 0>, <vanilla, talents,  7, 1>, and <vanilla, talents,  7, 2>

texts.text: Removed.

changes.developerCommentary: With the baseline kit changes, there's no more room for these talents.

changes.name: New: Kritzroid

texts.text: <modified, abilities, heroic, 0> now makes allied heroes' basic attacks deal an extra 30% damage.

changes.developerCommentary: I didn't want to just buff attack speed and movement speed as a simple buff and wanted to make something that reminds me of the Kritzkrieg from TF2. Perfect time to make Morales a significant problem considering that some characters are troublesome with higher attack damage.

changes.name: New: Caffeineroids

texts.text: Increase <modified, abilities, heroic, 0> movement speed bonus by 25% and makes the target unkillable.

changes.developerCommentary: The risk plays with Morales, remember that the <modified, abilities, basic, 0> can be cancelled with crowd control.

changes.name: New: Get back to the fight-roids

texts.text: Targets receive additional healing equal to 330% of the <modified, abilities, basic, 0>.

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to give it 300% of the original <modified, abilities, basic, 0> value.

changes.name: <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1>

texts.text: Moved to baseline (W).

changes.developerCommentary: Moved to baseline W so not necessary to be here anymore.

changes.name: <vanilla, abilities,  heroic, 0>

texts.text: Removed.

changes.developerCommentary: Made it a baseline ult so it's not necessary to be here anymore.

changes.name: New: There's always room for one more

texts.text: <modified, abilities, basic, 1> now takes off 5 seconds after being used and can carry any amount of people.

changes.developerCommentary: It's supposed to work like before for any nostalgic player.

changes.name: New: Ambulance driving

texts.text: Now <modified, abilities, basic, 1> calls upon Morales after 1 second of channeling, the <modified, abilities, basic, 1> is 150% faster and has the cooldown reduced by half plus instantly taking off as soon as it's used.

changes.developerCommentary: This works very close to how the old <modified, abilities, basic, 1> was, but only Morales will ride it.

changes.name: New: Reinforcements

texts.text: (Active)Call down a <modified, abilities, basic, 1> Dropship at your Hall of Storms for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when a hero enters, the <modified, abilities, basic, 1> will travel to the target location to unload the passenger (Shares cooldown with <modified, abilities, basic, 1> )

changes.developerCommentary: I had to make the talent as NEW because it was a extended part of the medivac.Changed it to hold only one person and also drop it where Morales wants for increased map control potential.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  13, 0>, <vanilla, talents,  13, 1>, and <vanilla, talents,  13, 2>

texts.text: Moved to level 7.

changes.developerCommentary: The <modified, abilities, basic, 2> talent tier isn't so strong, and the new talents created for <modified, abilities, basic, 1> are somewhat strong, so I'm changing positions to level 7 for better power spikes.

changes.name: New: MediGrenade

texts.text: Morales' <modified, abilities, basic, 2> now gets bigger the farther it travels, up to 40% extra. On explosion, it also heals allied heroes in the area by 480.

changes.developerCommentary: Sometimes using the <modified, abilities, basic, 2> feels like an disadvantage and this is a talent option for this games.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  16, 2>

texts.text: Removed.

changes.developerCommentary: No more safeguard needed

changes.name: First Responder

texts.text: Changed functionality: Morales can overheal targets, granting them an overshield up to 20% of their maximum health that rapidly decays after 5 seconds. Healing resets the shield duration.

changes.developerCommentary: Inspired by the Tf2 medic overheal and bringing some more utility for late game Morales

changes.name: New: Focus Morales!

texts.text: When Morales dies, every hero nearby will receive the <modified, abilities, heroic, 0> effects for 4 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: Now the people on ranked will think twice before saying that

changes.name: New: Healing Beacon

texts.text: Morales drops a beacon with 1200 health for 15 seconds. If Morales redirects her <modified, abilities, basic, 0> to the beacon, all allied heroes within 6.5 range of that beacon will receive the <modified, abilities, basic, 0> and overcharge effects used by Morales.(60 sec de cooldown)

changes.developerCommentary: I always saw an opportunity to make Morales area healing a thing and with the <modified, abilities, heroic, 0> changes it gets even better

changes.name: New: I am Ambulance!

texts.text: Activate to increase Morales' movement speed by 125% and grant her unstoppable for 4 seconds.(Cooldown 45 seconds)
Passive: Increase her energy generation by 25%.

changes.developerCommentary: This is made to be the ultimate safe talento for Morales..i wanted to go more on a Soraka from Lol passive route but i taught this would be funnier and better.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents,  20, 2>, <vanilla, talents,  20, 3>

texts.text: Removed.

changes.developerCommentary: <vanilla, talents,  20, 3> now comes earlier and <vanilla, talents,  20, 2> have no more space in the game
